pageContext.claim: “Speaking of tanks, we left our great tank, I was supposed to close down, we have a tank factory in Lima. Lima, Ohio, and it was scheduled to close. And I went to see it. And I said, 'No way, we're closing it because there's no way we could ever reproduce that incredible,' and you know what happened? We didn't close it.”
pageContext.analysis: This story is a fantasy, Trump has steered more funding to this tank plant in Ohio, but it was never in danger of closing.
